text: Victor Pollard was born 7 September, 1945 in Burnley. He was a cricketer and footballer who played 32 tests and 3 one-day internationals for New Zealand and 7 internationals for the All Whites. He refused to play sport on Sundays due to religious grounds. ==Other websites== * * Vic Pollard, the captain who might have been Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:New Zealand footballers
title: Vic Pollard
